price: One koji budu vjerovali i dobra djela činili čeka oproštaj i opskrba plemenita.
arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
